page.title: 01Bildeston & District,Suffolk
page.content: Our grid covers a varied rural area consisting of 5 villages,Bildeston, Hitcham,Wattisham,Nedging & Naughton, Surrounded by large areas of agricult- ural land.It is typical of rural Suffolk with many farms and scattered housing,limited amenities,magnificent churches and beautiful centuries old timber framed houses with thatched roofs. Travel features strongly,with most homes having at least one family member commuting daily to Ipswich (15 miles) or Bury St.Edmunds (18 miles for work,and many children travelling by bus to school. Our area contains Bildeston Primary School which has 135 pupils,5 teaching staff, 2 part-time teachers,a secretary a cook and assistant cook, 3 dinner helpers and 3 cleaners.
